post_title: Interested in dj work in Warsaw. Where can I find a DJ vacancy?

comments.author: AcanthaceaeWild1770
comments.body: McDonald's hiring.Dj burger, bring it on .. can you flip some chips? Mix some flavors?

comments.author: Tranecarid
comments.body: In music clubs. No need to thank me.

comments.author: ardweebno
comments.body: Nyx hotels has a pretty regular rotation of DJs on Thursday through Saturday nights.  Talk to the bar manager about getting into the rotation.  Keep on mind they will want to see some of your work, so if you have done any DJing and have video of it, put it on YouTube and provide the links.  Good luck!
